doc.title: La vida de Laura
doc.plot: Laura, belongs to one family whose situation made worse before the death of its father. Laura is an rebellious girl who with her actions tries to cross the borders of the reasonable thing. A day happens something that will really scare it and will not change its course of autodestruction. This short one presents/displays a narration centered in the subject of the tobacco problem, sight like one problem that not assume in the next social surroundings. It demonstrates indifference of the human being front to herself
